allow_pre_releases.message: Allow dependencies to be resolved to pre-release versions?

choose_package_manager.message: Which package manager should be used for installation?

major_version_count.message: How many major versions should be allowed for downgrades?

minor_version_count.message: How many minor and patch versions should be allowed per major version?

modify_package_json.message: Modify the package.json file to depict the resolved dependency versions?

keep_versions.message: Keep the currently specified versions in package.json?

choose_dependencies_to_resolve.message: Choose the dependencies to consider in resolution

try_again.message: Do you want to try again with other properties?
